Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO REAL PROPERTY TAXATION

Title: Provides a tax exemption on real property owned by active auxiliary police officers in local law enforcement agencies in certain counties
Summary: Provides a tax exemption on real property owned by active auxiliary police officers in local law enforcement agencies in certain counties having a population of more than three hundred twenty thousand and less than three hundred fifty thousand, determined in accordance with the latest federal decennial census.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to providing a tax exemption on real property owned by active auxiliary police officers in local law enforcement agencies in certain counties
